channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel Corporation -- Intel Graphics Driver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel Corporation -- Intel Graphics Driver

item.title: CVE-2018-12154|2024-08-05T08:30:57.450Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20graphics%20driver
item.description: Denial of Service in Unified Shader Compiler in Intel Graphics Drivers before 10.18.x.5056 (aka 15.33.x.5056), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057) and 20.19.x.5058 (aka 15.40.x.5058) may allow an unprivileged user to potentially create an infinite loop and crash an application via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12153|2024-08-05T08:30:57.437Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20graphics%20driver
item.description: Denial of Service in Unified Shader Compiler in Intel Graphics Drivers before 10.18.x.5056 (aka 15.33.x.5056), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057) and 20.19.x.5058 (aka 15.40.x.5058) may allow an unprivileged user from a virtual machine guest to potentially crash the host system via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-3611|2024-08-05T04:50:30.317Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20graphics%20driver
item.description: Bounds check vulnerability in User Mode Driver in Intel Graphics Driver 15.40.x.4 and 21.20.x.x allows unprivileged user to cause a denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-12152|2024-08-05T08:30:57.491Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%20graphics%20driver
item.description: Pointer corruption in Unified Shader Compiler in Intel Graphics Drivers before 10.18.x.5056 (aka 15.33.x.5056), 10.18.x.5057 (aka 15.36.x.5057) and 20.19.x.5058 (aka 15.40.x.5058) may allow an unauthenticated remote user to potentially execute arbitrary WebGL code via local access.
